head.title: Remove Signatures from {{FileFormatUp}} Files Using {{ProgLang}} Applications
head.description: Enhance your {{ProgLang}} applications with {{ProdFullName}}, enabling the removal of previously added signatures from {{FileFormatUp}} files.

header.title: Remove Signatures from {{FileFormatUp}} Files with {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Our solution not only allows you to sign business documents but also provides the capability to locate and remove various types of signatures using {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers a comprehensive signing solution, capable of handling various types of signatures such as text, images, barcodes, digital certificates, and stamps. This tool supports over 60 different file formats, including PDFs, MS Office documents, image files, ZIP archives, and many other commonly used formats. Moreover, once signatures are applied, they can be easily searched, verified, edited, or removed whenever needed.

formats.title: Remove Signatures from Various File Formats
formats.description: Our {{ProdFullName}} solution supports the removal of signatures from over 60 different file formats.

operations.title: Learn About Our Key Features
operations.description: Explore the diverse operations and signature methods available with our platform

more_features.title: Enhance Business Processes with Signature Management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} is designed for signing and managing business file formats, allowing you to add, modify, verify, or delete signatures as needed.

feature_1.title: Sign Documents
feature_1.content: Easily add text, image, barcode, QR code, or stamp signatures to any page of supported documents. Utilize hidden metadata like EXIF in images or secure document content from unauthorized modifications with digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Search and Verification
feature_2.content: Maximize the potential of signed documents by verifying signatures to ensure their validity. You can also retrieve a comprehensive list of all signatures within a document through a simple search.

feature_3.title: Modify Signatures
feature_3.content: Most previously added signatures can be adjusted. You can easily modify text, reposition the signature, or change its color.

feature_4.title: Delete Signatures
feature_4.content: Our solution fully supports CRUD operations for signatures, allowing you to delete various types of signatures from a document as needed.

examples.comment_1: Pass the document containing the signatures to be deleted to {{TextSignature}}
examples.comment_2: Retrieve the text signatures present in the document
examples.comment_3: Delete the first located text signature
examples.comment_4: Process the result of the deletion

steps.title: Steps for Deleting Text Signatures from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to delete text signatures in {{FileFormatUp}} files using their applications by following a few simple steps.
content.step_1: Pass the {{FileFormatUp}} path to an instance of the {{TextSignature}} class.
content.step_2: Use the Search method to retrieve all text signatures from the document.
content.step_3: Delete one or more of the located text signatures.
content.step_4: Analyze the results of the document processing.

code_1.title: Remove All QR-Code Signatures
code_1.content: Learn how to remove all QR-code signatures embedded within a document.
code_1.comment_1: Provide a document that contains QR-code signatures
code_1.comment_3: Process the result of the deletion
